patthana16.86:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.86:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.86:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
